Real Time Weather Location APP This application is created by TOMA Victoria and SILITRĂ Mihai-Andrei dedicated for Real Time Weather Location Traffic System, carried out under their draft license.

Bluetooth commands to send: "Not connected!" Read/Write to %1$s failed! Closing the bluetooth communication. Bluetooth device is OFFLINE.
Go to main screen if you want to send data. Bluetooth service is active. If you want to close the database service, please stop the Bluetooth service.
You can't close the location service because the GPS module didn't send any location yet.
DataBase Show DataBase content Hide DataBase content
write here the command Reply from You are near dangerous places! You are in a dangerous region! Near regions presents the following dangers:
Invalid coordinates! Must be as hint format, latitude between -90:90 and longitude between -180:180 Invalid code. Must be between 100 and 499. Invalid temperature. Must be between -50 and 50. Invalid humidity. Must be between 0 and 100. Invalid air. Must be between 0 and 100. Invalid data! Sent data to database.
Region weather: danger: Temperature Temperature: "Temperature: " Temperature: temperature: %1$.1f℃ %1$d℃ Humidity Humidity: Humidity: "Humidity: " humidity: "Air: " Air quality: air: Speed: "Speed: " Speed Direction: "Direction: " Direction Pollution: Pollution

RTWL@BLUETOOTH_SETTINGS_KEYx RTWL@GOOGLE_MAPS_SETTINGS_KEY RTWL@MAIN_DEVICE_KEY RTWL@BLUETOOTH_RECEIVE_DELIMITER_KEY RTWL@BLUETOOTH_RECEIVE_STATE_DELIMITER_KEY RTWL@MAP_DEFAULT_ZOOM_KEY RTWL@MAX_ZOOM_REGION_KEY
-1		|		rs			|		reset
Soft reset Arduino
------------------------------------
 0		|		gr		|		ping
Get response from Arduino
------------------------------------
 1		|		gd		|		get data
Get sensors value
------------------------------------
 2		|		pd		|		proxy fail
Warn proxy sensor failure
------------------------------------
 3		|		gc		|		get coordinates
Set Arduino to send GPS coordinates every second
------------------------------------
 4		|		dgc		|		disable get coordinates
Disable get coordinates feature
------------------------------------
